snippet: General Manager Brian Cashman defended a lack of spending as the Yankees made an $12 million contract offer to Kevin Youkilis, the former Red Sox third baseman.
abstract: New Yor Yankees general manager Brian Cashman quiets industry critics and perplexed fans by finally making a big-time bid for marquee player, offering $12 million contract to former Boston Red Sox infielder Kevin Youkilis during winter meetings in Nashville, TN.
lead_paragraph: General Manager Brian Cashman defended a lack of spending as the Yankees made an $12 million contract offer to Kevin Youkilis, the former Red Sox third baseman.

headline.seo: Yankees Offer Kevin Youkilis $12 Million for One Year
headline.main: Back to Old Spending Ways, Yanks Offer Youkilis a Deal
headline.print_headline: Back to Old Spending Ways, Yanks Offer Youkilis a Deal
